Welcome to the new episode of the TNW Podcast â€” the show where we discuss the latest developments in the European technology ecosystem and feature interviews with some of the most interesting people in the industry.

In todayâ€™s special episode, weâ€™re happy to present an interview with Diana van Stijn, co-founder and chief medical officer at Lapsi Health, a Dutch startup that builds smart medical hardware â€” starting with a digital stethoscope. Also featured in the interview is the sound of Andriiâ€™s heart as captured by Lapsiâ€™s first device, Keikku.
